description.english: Unlock every level.
description.german: Schalte jedes Level frei.
description.french: Débloquez tous les niveaux.
description.italian: Sblocca tutti i livelli.
description.spanish: Desbloquea todos los niveles.

description.english: Complete every level.
description.german: Schließe jedes Level ab.
description.french: Terminez tous les niveaux.
description.italian: Completa tutti i livelli.
description.spanish: Completa todos los niveles.

description.english: Achieve B Rank or higher on every level.
description.german: Erreiche mindestens Rang B in jedem Level.
description.french: Atteignez au moins le rang B pour chaque niveau.
description.italian: Ottieni la valutazione B o superiore in ogni livello.
description.spanish: Alcanza el rango B o más en todos los niveles.
description.russian: Достигни класса B или выше на всех уровнях.

description.english: Achieve A Rank or higher on every level.
description.german: Erreiche mindestens Rang A in jedem Level.
description.french: Atteignez au moins le rang A pour chaque niveau.
description.italian: Ottieni la valutazione A o superiore in ogni livello.
description.spanish: Alcanza el rango A o más en todos los niveles.
description.russian: Достигни класса А или выше на всех уровнях.

description.english: Achieve S Rank on every level.
description.german: Erreiche Rang S in jedem Level.
description.french: Atteignez le rang S pour chaque niveau.
description.italian: Ottieni la valutazione S o superiore in ogni livello.
description.spanish: Alcanza el rango S en todos los niveles.
description.russian: Достигни класса S на всех уровнях.

description.english: Complete any level in under 00:02:50
description.german: Schließe jedes Level in weniger als 00:02:50 ab.
description.french: Terminez un niveau en moins de 00:02:50.
description.italian: Completa un livello in meno di 00:02:50.
description.spanish: Completa cualquier nivel en un tiempo por debajo de 00:02:50.
description.russian: Пройди любой уровень за менее чем 00:02:50.

displayName.english: Both a Marathon and A Sprint
displayName.spanish: Una maratón y un sprint A-sombroso

description.english: Have a Total Completion Time of under 38:00:00
description.german: Erziele eine Gesamtabschlusszeit von unter 38:00:00.
description.french: Terminez le jeu en moins de 38:00:00.
description.italian: Ottieni un tempo totale inferiore a 38:00:00.
description.spanish: Completa el juego en un tiempo total por debajo de 38:00:00.

description.english: Blue and Orange have died 50 times between them.
description.german: Blau und Orange sind insgesamt 50-mal gestorben.
description.french: Les billes bleue et orange sont mortes 50 fois au total.
description.italian: Blue e Orange sono morte 50 volte (in due).
description.spanish: Azul y Naranja se han matado 50 veces entre ellos.
description.russian: Синька и Цитрус вместе умерли 50 раз.

description.english: Blue and Orange have died 250 times between them.
description.german: Blau und Orange sind insgesamt 250-mal gestorben.
description.french: Les billes bleue et orange sont mortes 250 fois au total.
description.italian: Blue e Orange sono morte 250 volte (in due).
description.spanish: Azul y Naranja se han matado 250 veces entre ellos.
description.russian: Синька и Цитрус вместе умерли 250 раз.

description.english: Blue and Orange have died 1,500 times between them.
description.german: Blau und Orange sind insgesamt 1 500-mal gestorben.
description.french: Les billes bleue et orange sont mortes 1 500 fois au total.
description.italian: Blue e Orange sono morte 1500 volte (in due).
description.spanish: Azul y Naranja se han matado 1500 veces entre ellos.
description.russian: Синька и Цитрус вместе умерли 1500 раз.

description.english: Collect Time Bonuses 25 times.
description.german: Sammle 25-mal Zeitboni ein.
description.french: Récupérez 25 bonus de temps.
description.italian: Ottieni bonus tempo 25 volte.
description.spanish: Recoge bonificaciones de tiempo 25 veces.

description.english: Collect Time Bonuses 150 times.
description.german: Sammle 150-mal Zeitboni ein.
description.french: Récupérez 150 bonus de temps.
description.italian: Ottieni bonus tempo 150 volte.
description.spanish: Recoge bonificaciones de tiempo 150 veces.

description.english: Learn something (very) important.
description.german: Lerne eine (sehr) wichtige Lektion.
description.french: Découvrez quelque chose de (très) important.
description.italian: Impara una cosa (molto) importante.
description.spanish: Aprende algo (muy) importante.

description.english: Find out how to turn back time.
description.german: Finde heraus, wie man die Zeit zurückdreht.
description.french: Trouvez le moyen de remonter le temps.
description.italian: Scopri come riportare indietro il tempo.
description.spanish: Averigua cómo retroceder en el tiempo.

description.english: Find the pew pews and the shooty bits.
description.german: Finde die Peng-pengs und die Ballerdinger.
description.french: Trouvez les armes à feu.
description.italian: Trova gli zing-zing e i bang-bang.
description.spanish: Encuentra los bang bang y los cañones.

description.english: Find a faster mode of travel.
description.german: Entdecke eine schnellere Art des Reisens.
description.french: Trouvez un moyen de transport plus rapide.
description.italian: Trova il modo di spostarti più rapidamente.
description.spanish: Encuentra un modo más rápido de viajar.

description.english: Find out that not everything's bolted down.
description.german: Finde heraus, dass nicht alles niet- und nagelfest ist.
description.french: Découvrez que tout n'est pas fixe.
description.italian: Scopri che non tutto è fisso e immobile.
description.spanish: Descubre que no todo estaba atornillado.
description.russian: Узнай, почему не все закреплено на месте.

displayName.french: Ateliers de recherche du trou de ver
displayName.spanish: Talleres de investigación de agujeros de gusano

description.english: Look, they aren't portals okay?
description.german: Es sind keine Portale, verstanden?
description.french: Mais non, ce ne sont pas des portails !
description.italian: Senti, non sono portali, OK?
description.spanish: Fíjate, no son portales, ¿vale?

displayName.french: Mais il y en a combien ?!

description.english: Stretch your concentration further than before.
description.german: Konzentriere dich noch stärker als zuvor.
description.french: Prolongez votre concentration comme jamais auparavant.
description.italian: Concentrati ancora più di prima.
description.spanish: Expande tu concentración más allá que antes.

displayName.italian: Fai di me ciò che vuoi

description.english: Be able to turn on those big puppy dog eyes.
description.german: Lerne, wie man den niedlichen Hundeblick einschaltet.
description.french: Faites les yeux doux.
description.italian: Impara ad attivare quegli occhioni da cucciolo.
description.spanish: Consigue abrir esos enormes ojos perrunos.

description.english: Find some strange rectangular friends.
description.german: Finde merkwürdige, rechteckige Freunde.
description.french: Découvrez d'étranges amis rectangulaires.
description.italian: Trova degli strani amici rettangolari.
description.spanish: Encuentra algunos extraños amigos rectangulares.
